website_summaries.verdict: A water-based silicone primer by a popular drugstore brand that reduces shine and minimizes pores. It creates a smooth base for applying makeup.
pros: Feels smooth and creamy and absorbs quickly, resulting in a lightweight base for your favorite makeup
Doesn't tend to settle into fine lines
Reduces the appearance of large pores for most users
Oil-free formula is ideal for oily skin
cons: If your skin is quite oily, you may need to blot your face throughout the day
Doesn't do much to extend the wear of makeup

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good primer
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and mask of pregnancy so I’m always looking for products to help minimize my redness. This product helps but I wish it reduced the redness a little more. I love how soft my face feels and how well my makeup goes on top of it. I will probably buy this product again. In my picture the left side of my face has the primer on it and the right side does not.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Martin

customer_reviews.title: Product has no scent (good if you don't want that) but still a good dupe to too faced primer.
customer_reviews.text: I don't hate it, but I definitely don't LOVE it. I'll stick with my sephora urban decay primer and my too faced primers I like much better. There is no scent to this product. I feel that the urban decay optical illusion primer and too faced primer moisturizes my skin better. May just be me though! Slowly, but surely, this product has actually become a favorite of mine. It makes my skin feel so soft. Granted, I still like the too faced primers better, but I agree with what people say about this being a good enough dupe to that one!
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. Very good for oily skin. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Perfect for her skin which is a combination of normal, oily t zone, and breakouts. This seems to work wonderfully on all areas of her face giving according to her (and I agree) a flawless look
customer_reviews.author: The Apprentice

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. It helps cover my "rosy" areas and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this makeup base for several years. Absolutely love it. It helps cover my "rosy" areas and provides a good base for any makeup.
customer_reviews.author: S. Green

customer_reviews.title: prevents clogging pores and smooths face for foundation
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my nose and crease of cheeks where my pores are largest. I put on right on top of serum. This part of my face doesn’t get additional moisturizer because of my enlarged pores and propensity to clogging, the results under makeup are really impressive, smooth skin, no visible pores, and bonus, less clogging. Thrilled at this affordable product, recommended by a magazine. I am 56 years old.
customer_reviews.author: SexySadie

customer_reviews.title: Goes on super smooth and makes skin feel soft
customer_reviews.text: Goes on super smooth and makes skin feel soft. Didn’t see any results from the green tint. Not the greatest product I’ve ever used in my whole life but is good for the price - would buy again. 4/25/18 EDIT WITH UPDATE: After using the product every day since I bought it, I will not be repurchasing. I don't think it really does anything at all. Definitely would not recommend for someone with oily skin - it does not keep foundation on nor is it long lasting. I was really rooting for this product to work because of the good reviews. Overall, this product is nothing special and I would recommend spending your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Foundation Tight on Skin
customer_reviews.text: LOCKING FOUNDATION: This product kind of works like double-sided tape. It helps whatever foundation you have to attach tightly onto your skin. The primer gets absorbed quickly, so you'll have to apply in little dabs at a time. BLURRING/SMOOTHING: It does help in achieving a more smooth appearance of the skin, but it doesn't hide medium to large pores well. It works to refine at the very surface level of the skin. Other primers may fill in pores better, but the major power of this primer is its ability to lock-in foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Was hoping it would cover red spots and lessen redness in cheek and nose area. This product did absolutely nothing. I tried it several times hoping for different results. Never again. Next time I’ll go to a department store beauty counter so the salesperson can demonstrate before I lay down my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie1949

customer_reviews.title: I have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a lot of primers from the most expensive to the least and, I absolutely love this primer. It doesn’t make your face oily at all and it leaves your makeup on. Also it didn’t break me out I have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adds moisture to my maturing (46yrs) skin...
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I am 46 with normal to dry skin and this adds moisture to my skin and helps my foundation to look smoother. If you have more mature or dry skin you might really enjoy this. I'll be getting more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: C. WallaceTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin which causes my foundation to get sticky and messy a few hours after applying my makeup. This primer completely solves that problem. I can apply my foundation at 8:00 in the morning and my skin still looks fresh when I go out to dinner at 7:00!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Longino

customer_reviews.title: not impressed with this primer
customer_reviews.text: I have to stick with two stars because this product wasn't unpleasant and didn't clog my pores or cause breakouts etc. But it's really ineffective as primer. I agree with other reviews saying that plain lotion would do better as "primer" than this watery pale green product. It does nothing to eliminate redness whatsoever. Fortunately a couple of weeks after I started using this disappointing so-called primer, I found a new great foundation that eliminates the need for primer anyway. I don't recommend this, it does almost nothing except some slight moisturization.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: I found what I have been searching FOR!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I have been buying a ton of primers for the last few months, trying to find one which is cost effective yet still can stand up against my expensive primer brands. HELLO! Maybeline Face Studio Master Prime Primer, Blur + Redness Control is simply amazing! It really is a great primer which my foundation can blend easily. I feel like its light weight and doesn't cake up. I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Impressed- a very good "dupe"
customer_reviews.text: I was using the really expensive version of this which I think was around $34. I've been trying to replace w/ drugstore brands and I didn't expect much but wow it's great. Skin feels super velvety and it really helps makeup go on well. I thought I would run out pretty fast so I bought another one but I'm still on the first one- you don't need a whole lot. Update: I bought this almost a year ago and I still use it everyday! Definitely will stick to this brand.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: this is a primer, and it does its job.
customer_reviews.text: This is not my favorite primer by any means, but I was looking for something less expensive and came across this one. It's ok, I guess, it does what it is supposed to do to an extent. If you are looking for a poreless appearance though, this product is not going to give that to you. This is a silicone based primer, or at least it feels like it, which I typically prefer. It is farily gentle on skin, I didn't experience any breakouts related to the use of this product.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy and his Wife

customer_reviews.title: nice smell and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: i really like this primer. ive been trying different brands these past couple months and have found this to be the most moisterizing and the fact that it has spf makes it that much better. the ONLY improvement i would make is i wish it was more purple. i have a yellow undertone to my skin and feel the need to neutralize it with a purple pigment. i usually just add a drop of gentian violet to my foundation, does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Will buy this again, and again, and again...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried all the other brands, and this is by far the best out of all of them. Leaves your face soft, moisturized and feeling/looking younger and refreshed! Would definitely recommend this product! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C Paine

customer_reviews.title: Don't love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in this primer. The name "Master Primer" is misleading. There is nothing special or more efficient about this product than you find in other primers. Although my complexion isn't perfect, I'm lucky to have a clear and generally smooth complexion. I don't see a difference whether applying it or leaving it off. Makes ño difference. Doesn't add glow or shine and doesn't make application of foundation easier or more difficult. I don't like the consistency of the cream. It's a bit pasty.
customer_reviews.author: S.  Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Best primer for uneven color
customer_reviews.text: Best primer I’ve tried yet. Works as a replacement to my moisturizer, is lightweight and holds foundation well for up to 16+ hours easily. Definitely helps even my very natural uneven skin tone which is red, sun damaged and scarred (from acne/popping/picking). Also smooths and minimizes pores. In the pic I washed my face w tea tree scrub wash, applied “humane” toner, mabelline primer, dermablend foundation and a touch of Youngblood loose powder mixed w dermablend setting powder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! This primer is just like lotion
customer_reviews.text: Here's what I think about it... I love it! This primer is just like lotion. It absorbs very quickly, so you shouldn't worry about having any trace of white on your face. Makeup application is easier because it causes your skin to become very soft and smooth. A little of this goes a long way, so there's no need of applying a whole lot all over your face. Even though the bottle was smaller than I expected, it is more than enough. I received this primer back in October, and the primer bottle is still full. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna A.

customer_reviews.title: First primer I tried
customer_reviews.text: I recently started to notice my skin isn’t as nice as it once was. I had used primers in the past (mostly ones that makeup stores throw in the bag ) that was back when I was young fresh faced and able to spend my paychecks at fancy make up stores. I searched the reviews and this sounded like what I was looking for. Now to be honest I’m looking for a Miracle product. This one was good. I saw a difference but wasn’t the miracle I’m searching for. I have rebought the green one (and a couple others) so it is worth the purchase and I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Logan janel

customer_reviews.title: Didn't cut down ruddiness
customer_reviews.text: The cream was smooth as silk, but it was hardly even green, which is what cuts down ruddiness. At first I thought I had ordered the wrong product, but when I turned a light onto the cream on my finger, I could see a slight trace of green. Still, I used it for two weeks, about half a tube, and my ruddiness was still there. I'm sorry this didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is just meh.
customer_reviews.text: I have a few different primers. This one does a decent job reducing redness- I have Little rosacea and am just naturally ruddy a bit anyway. However I don’t like the way this preps the skin- does t make me feel like my skin is now a smooth canvas ready for application of other products. It feels a bit heavy. I prefer the slightly more expensive Neutrogena which makes for a great matte surface. This is now a “3rd string” backup product.
customer_reviews.author: TeamMom

customer_reviews.title: Did pretty much nothing. Feels oily
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 400 primer (blur + pore minimize). This product did pretty much nothing for me. It had an oily, almost greasy feel, which put me off immediately (idk if it actually has any oils in it, but it definitely eels like it). It felt like it didn't ever quite dry down on my face. It didn't do anything longevity-wise. My makeup came off more than it usually does, in fact. I will say that my foundation went on very smooth when I used this primer. It did make my skin look pretty smooth and blurred at first, but as the day went on my skin kept looking worse. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Safa Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Works as well, if not better than the expensive primers!
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly as it claims. I've used Smashbox, Mally, Sephora, Mary Kay, and this very inexpensive product does just the same, if not BETTER! Great product! I am 40+ and have normal to dry skin. My pores are a little visible without makeup, but when I use this with my foundation OR tinted moisturizer I can tell that my pores are noticeably smaller in appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews that mention redness.This doesn't help a bit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the green. It's a decent enough primer I guess (but not as good as some others) but it does nothing about the slight redness around my nose, chin and forehead. You can't tell any difference with or without the primer. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MissDenver

customer_reviews.title: Green container - WHITE primer
customer_reviews.text: The container is green, but the primer is WHITE - and goes on translucent. I have rosacea and was looking for a green primer that could counterbalance the red. No such luck with this. As far as a primer, it doesn’t do much. I am used to using high-end primers, though, and this basically just feels like lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Zuber

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: This does not work to help reduce redness. I waited a while to post this and used the entire bottle trying different ways to make it work. If you apply this before applying foundation, your foundation will look caked on your face. It is not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: LADIES! A MUST FOR YOUR MAKE UP BAG!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, you NEED this in your makeup bag! I cannot believe I didn't use this stuff before. My makeup looks better when I've put it on and I swear my makeup lasts longer. I will be teaching my daughters about primer and how important it is to your beauty routine!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Surpringly provides a good, all day wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim so I could compare it to my expensive primers. Frankly, it was fine. My makeup work well throughout the day. Not bad at all for a “drug store” priced primer. I’ll definitely keep it on hand as a back up!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Walk

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have very acne prone skin. And i read this is one of the best drugstore primers for acne prone skin. It feels like a silicone base. It did spread very well on to my face. It didnt make my pores completely disapear, but it did allow my foundation to blend very well. Cant beat the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have super oily and uneven textured skin. I love putting this on my face and I think it improved my acne because it protects the skin. I really love how it feels and it doesn’t feel too siliconey. It keeps you foundation looking fresh and even.
customer_reviews.author: Miss J

customer_reviews.title: Great primer!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reliable inexpensive primer... this has a good texture to it and seems very moisturizing while helping my makeup last all day! I have tried many different primers and this one seems like one of the best!
customer_reviews.author: T.Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & moisturizing - good for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the blur & smooth primer (white bottle) and it is my new favorite primer! I have tried applying this without moisturizer to see how my skin feels, and this primer is very moisturizing but not heavy. It gives my face a smooth surface before applying my foundation. I have a more flawless finish and I think its because of the primer! I also have very oily skin, and this primer does not make my skin anymore oily. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: OK but does not cover redness.
customer_reviews.text: A nice simple foundation base for younger skin, not dry skin, and good for covering fair skin pink, but not for fair skin redness. Barely noticeable on but does NOT cut the red. Formula is lightweight and thin. Glides on but sinks in so quickly you need to use more if you're dry. Once on the skin it looks clear, not tinted and therefore no camouflage.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a greasy shine
customer_reviews.text: No real blur because it leaves a greasy shine. So disappointed. I have used other blur sticks and gels by this manufacturer and they have a nice matte finish and do a nice job at blurring, but this one with SPF is shiny and appears greasy.
customer_reviews.author: RSS

customer_reviews.title: MAKES SKIN GREASY + MAKEUP DOESNT HOLD
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time, unopened or tampered with. That's really the only good thing j can say about this product. It made my skin feel oily and slick and my makeup wouldnt hold onto my skin making it appear patchy and greasy!! My skin felt disgusting after wearing this primer and I'm breaking out in acne because of it. I will definitely have to upgrade to a more expensive more effective primer.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for light color correction!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect product for light color correcting and primer! This 2 in 1 primer is light on the skin and does not get greasy or impact the pores negatively. I have redness across my cheeks and the bridge of my nose from pregnancy, and this item along with my moisturizer have helped to calm the look of the redness and give me back some of my confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good makeup primer
customer_reviews.text: I have liked this primer for awhile now. I think it’s my 3rd tube. It goes on smoothly, helps with redness and then my Maybelline Fit Me Dewy foundation goes on really smooth as well. I like them both.
customer_reviews.author: Sher Bear

customer_reviews.title: One of My Favorite Primers
customer_reviews.text: As someone with very red cheeks and a tendency to get red in the face this is awesome for redness control. It's not super heavy and it really makes my makeup look better and last longer. I have sensitive skin and this primer hasn't been an issue. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Glenna

customer_reviews.title: No just.... no I’m sorry
customer_reviews.text: It did not hydrate or prime my skin while fine from a distance my make up would look horrible in the end. Tried it on my eyes and my shadows would NEVER stick at all.
customer_reviews.author: Just a little grief seed

customer_reviews.title: thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: I have red, blotchy skin which I hate. I'm not fond of lots of concealer and foundation but I thought I'd give this product a try to see if it made me any happier with my face. One review mentioned she even liked using it when she did not put on foundation. That's what I've been doing and I'm thrilled. No, it doesn't cover up all the red. However, it does exactly what it says -- it BLURS. My skin looks less red and smooth and even. It's a keeper for me.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving this one star because you can’t place a review with zero stars. I have some redness/blotchiness so bought this to help at least lessen the redness. I used Smashbox before, which worked great, but I didn’t want to pay that price. While I didn’t expect perfection from this particular product, I did expect it to do something. It did NOTHING. First of all, the tube is green, but the cream itself is pure white. Not a good sign for a color correcting primer but I tried it anyway. I put it on one side of my face and there was no difference at all. Please don’t waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!! Makes foundation look professional
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many face primers and this one is fantastic! It leaves ,y skin soft, and makes my foundation look flawless. I put mine on and let it set for 20 minutes before adding my foundation, then let the foundation set 20 minutes before adding blush and powder. This face primer goes a long way, a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell and made my skin irritated.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed with this product. I heard such good things about this product. I have a lot of redness on my face and this product is supposed to help tone down the redness but I saw absolutely no difference in my skin whatsoever. Also it had a chemically smell to the product which automatically irritated my skin. I honestly don't see a difference in what it's supposed to do even when I put a full face of makeup. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were more moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Makes my makeup last all day but I have very dry skin and wish it were more moisturizing. But I like this better than elf’s moisturizing primer, which makes my face feel oily. This primer makes my face feel like it’s sealed, smoothed, and ready for foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Satko

customer_reviews.title: Poreless!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a beauty blogger and for the price I thought why not. Absolutely great primer that reduces pores so foundation can go on smoother. There's a lot in this bottle too which is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cassell

customer_reviews.title: Caused terrible allergic Reactiin
customer_reviews.text: This product made my skin burn so badly, I wish someone could point out though what is the ingredient that caused this to avoid in future products, this is the second primer I try with that caused this...
customer_reviews.author: B. Nassif

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again. Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely fell in love with this wonder of a tube. The primer goes on easily. Creates an immediate palette of freshness. My skin looks 15 years younger. Reduces redness around nose. Covers my areas of discoloration. I still feel like I need my spf makeup to finish my routine, but only a smattering. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have redness on my chin area from acne and it always embarrasses me cause makeup does not cover it 100% and I don't have enough money to invest in all kinds of products to cover it when eventually the bad skin bleeds through. This works amazingly well and the price was perfect for my budget
customer_reviews.author: Martie K

customer_reviews.title: My go to primer
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite primer. It is a duoe for Lancome which I think is about $40. It makes a huge difference in yiur foundation appearance. You don't get a dry look. Really good for drier or sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Just meh.
customer_reviews.text: I was using another brand that was far more silky and smooth than this. This stuff is like chalk. It's not moisturizing or smoothing on my skin type. This doesn't set my make up at all or seem to make any difference in the longevity. Tossed in the garbage. Ordering my previous brand.
customer_reviews.author: Screts

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer. My skin is not difficult - a little oil, no acne, a little redness. This primer feels very light and leaves no oily feeling, it's similar to an oil-free lotion, kind of like Lubriderm. It covers any redness and oil that was on my face. I pair it with my favorite BB Cream and setting powder and my skin looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina M Butner

customer_reviews.title: Came promptly.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first primer I've ever used. I just finished the first bottle that my daughter gave me in a gift bag of new makeup. I tried ELF before buying this cuz I heard good things. Hated It. It's a new bottle just sitting there. I lie this so why mess w a good thing. Shld have just stuck with what I know I like.
customer_reviews.author: HeyChristina LovesART

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed! This goes on smoothly and I'm able to put my makeup on immediately after. It's sheer and makes my skin feel nice without being greasy. I really like the overall effect it has on my skin and the way my makeup looks on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Magillicutti

customer_reviews.title: Will keep looking for other brands.
customer_reviews.text: After using for a month, it comes out slightly silky, which makes it hard for it to properly sit on the face without extra effort, compared to other brand ones. I’ve been breaking out more than usually as well. Not sure if it’s because of this.
customer_reviews.author: 323erik

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best
customer_reviews.text: For lack of a better word-this primer almost "evaporates" once it leaves the tube, Application is a disappearing act -coverage is minimal I see absolutely nothing unique or special about the product Had it cost more-I would return it
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: It really does what it's name says, blur n smooth. Good for dry to normal skin but can be wear by oily skin people as well without an issue.. just apply some loose powder in the end of the makeup. And you are good to go. I use this to get a clear skin texture, even when i don't wear makeup at all.. i just apply this primer and allow it to set for sometime than apply some loose powder. 😊
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: As far as Primers go, this one does fairly well. I haven't really tried any primer (yet) that makes my make-up look as good at end of day as it did early in the morning. But this one does feel good on my face, and the price isn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: C. Luckie

customer_reviews.title: my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of acne and scars, as well as current red spots all over in addition to scars. This product helps mask it, in fact even just after applying this alone, with no other make up, I can see a HUGE difference than with nothing on at all.
customer_reviews.author: tracy cathey

customer_reviews.title: Meh, it's ok..
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad, but I prefer Elf. This is more of a lotion (it goes on white) that has to set prior to foundation application. I had a cold and had to blow my nose a bit and noticed a significant change in color under my nose, but it looked like a "wall" of makeup around where I had wiped, and I don't wear a heavy face. Gives a smooth texture, but yeah, I'm used to another product- so, not knocking them, just stating my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Smashbox primer dupe
customer_reviews.text: I heard online that this was a dupe for the super expensive smashbox primer so I gave it a try. I like to wear this because I have redness and it actually helps cancel some of it out. I wear this when I'm going for more natural days when I don't feel like putting on a full face. I'll put this one with some concealer on problem areas and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Erica G.

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE Primer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this primer for weeks and for the price it is the best! Maybelline has many different ones in this line! The blur + smooth works great to reduce pores and makes your foundation go on smoother! I've seen a major difference in how long the foundation lasts also. Will purchase again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Woah!
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin, and large poems. This is the first product that actually works for me. Due to having to wear a mask I don't put on base anymore. I just put this on and feel beautiful. Definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.author: T and A

customer_reviews.title: Blah.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried much better primers from the drugstore. This one is alright, but nothing special. Definitely minimizes pores temporarily, but really didn't make my foundation go on smoother or increase the wear. Won't be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: amazing, simply amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes it so you look as if you have a filter on your face. This stuff is amazing, I used to use a bare minerals one but I switched it up to save money and wow! Worked better than one high end brands
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wrona

customer_reviews.title: Rosacea skin, this isn't for you.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product with hopes it would cover my Rosacea skin (which is mild) as well as a product I had used but is no longer available. This is very thin & sheer. It does not cover the redness as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: not the best product
customer_reviews.text: I have visible pores and wanted something to give me that poreless effect. It somewhat works but It is not my favorite product because applying this product didn't make a big difference. Perhaps it's different on various skin types. It does moisturize your skin and is very gentle, didn't show any negative reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Sabita

customer_reviews.title: A miracle for facial redness
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally rave about beauty products, but this one has been a life-saver. I have fair skin prone to flushing. A couple of dabs of this primer on my cheeks, and any redness disappears. It's great (and long-lasting) under makeup, but I'm now wearing this cream every day on its own. It feels cool and soothing going on, and my skin looks flawless. Already ordered a year's supply.
customer_reviews.author: ARL

customer_reviews.title: Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect will buy again! It's cheaper online that at the local drugstores!
customer_reviews.author: Elva81

customer_reviews.title: not as good as the old version
customer_reviews.text: does very little for redness reduction like it's predecessor. Its more a primer than a green colored redness reducer. I used to buy this and only put this on to hide my paleness, but reparents, it barely does anything for overly pink or red skin tones.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It's very heavy, heavier than most silicone based primers but I was willing to get over that if it worked. It makes zero difference under ny foundation and it doesn't allow foundation to dry down so if u touch your face even after hours, your makeup will come off. Horrible primer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Primer, Period.
customer_reviews.text: I LIVE for this primer! Doesn’t have a nasty smell whatsoever, leaves a silky smooth finish on the skin and makes for a perfect base for my makeup. It also fills the large pores around my nose area and makes my beat come out flawless and glowy 😍👌🏾
customer_reviews.author: Coūrtney Chäntell ✨

customer_reviews.title: Allows for smoother application
customer_reviews.text: Primer is very moisturizing. Not sure if it made a huge impact on longevity when wearing make up but I did notice the application of make up has been smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Kurly Kene

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and this helps to calm it down. This primer doesn't make the rosecea go away, but it makes a difference. While calming my redness, it makes my skin feel soft and it has an SPF of 30. In my opinion this is a really good product.
customer_reviews.author: LindaColt

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this primer. Compared to higher end products, there is definitely a difference. But it is very affordable, accessible in most stores, and it does the job. Goes well with liquid foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L.

customer_reviews.title: Great little primer for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way with this! It's not greasy, provides a great base for all night or use on its own as a moisturiser. I have sensitive and dry skin, this stuff is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dearbhla Klue

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good base for dry skin. It doesn’t seem to increase the staying power of the foundation I use, but it does help it go on smoothly and prevent caking.
customer_reviews.author: ABH

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: It’s somewhat ashy as you put it on but it fades nicely before you put your makeup over it. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Paired with a matte foundation, it lasts well on oily skin. I use it with the MAC studio fix foundation and the Maybelline fit me translucent pressed powder. I have to say the Nyx Angel Veil is better, though.
customer_reviews.author: Karol C

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I have always had an extremely dry face, which makes wearing makeup very difficult... You know, the dry flakes and whatnot. But ever since I purchased this, my face feels moisturized (no, not oily) and my makeup looks great!! And stays all day! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Khyra Young

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I love this green primer. It does a good job brightening the face. It's not as green as others. However it's green enough for areas of your face that need less green coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Brimer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst primer I have ever used and trust me, I have used a lot. It doesn't blur one thing on my face if anything, it actually seemed to highlight my pores. I won't be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t make a difference if you prime with this or not
customer_reviews.text: Super greasy and has a strange smell. It does not make a difference if I use this product or not - my foundation wears the same. I won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Better than SMASHBOX
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a dupe for the Smashbox primer but to me it works just as good if not better and the price isn't too bad either. It arrived fast on time and I can't wait to order more from this seller. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: GOLDEN GLAMOURZON

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is listed as a gel but its just lotion. The stuff in the teal tube with the pink writing is more expensive, but way better quality.
customer_reviews.author: jenlynsea

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really minimize pores or blurs that well. I've only noticed a change in skin texture if I pack a lot on and let it dry. Not sure if this product is old or just not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Drewosity

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it got such good reviews as a primer. I was sadly disappointed. It felt greasy & heavy. It did not smooth out my skin at all. I will stick with my Bare Minerals Prime Time Primer. Its expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: wckdwanda

customer_reviews.title: This is some good stuff! I used to buy $40 brand (KVD)
customer_reviews.text: This is some good stuff! I used to buy $40 brand (KVD), but this is even BETTER. its not too watery like the Kat V I used to use. and it moisturizes my skin
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Sisters

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable primer
customer_reviews.text: Really nice blurring primer to use before you put on your foundation. It is not greasy like some other drugstore primers. I do wish it covered my redness a little more, though. All-in-all a good face primer at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy H.

customer_reviews.title: Never used primer before!
customer_reviews.text: So I’m embarrassed to say that I am 40 years old and my 9 year old niece just introduced me to primer lol. It is awesome. This brand was light, affordable and did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Ann S. Ginn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but causes me to breakout
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this goes on and the way it makes my makeup look afterwards. It smooth my skin and helps my makeup looks more finished. However it makes me breakout every time I use. I am so sad about this. I have normal skin type not prone to breakouts so I am not sure why this happens.
customer_reviews.author: D Dare

customer_reviews.title: Would Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great primer, it’s my go to drug store primer. It’s amazing amazon has it for such a great price. I save a few bucks every time I order it here as appose to buying it at a drug store or ultra. It’s very light weight and almost feels like a lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product, but it did absolutely nothing for my skin. It didn’t even out my skin tone, and it didn’t help my make up stay on any better. It was actually a little bit too drying.
customer_reviews.author: Gary White

customer_reviews.title: Removes the red tone in my face, YAY!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great in that it does tone down the red tone. That is a ++. I do have to reapply midday. Not a deal breaker. I also have to reapply my sunblock so this is a good time to do both and do a make-up touch-up.
customer_reviews.author: Miadicol

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it is not greasy and absorbs into the skin very well. There is no irritation thus far and it usually comes up pretty quick on me so that was a definite plus! It doesn't take a lot for full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Diva

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Gel consistency that gives you a finish that’s slightly dewy and soft matte. I like it for my skin. This is ideal for normal to dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tfra

customer_reviews.title: Blur & smooth
customer_reviews.text: I normally use a primer that cost 40. but I figured I would give this a try since the price was so great. I'm really impressed with how smooth it feels and it definitely keeps my foundation on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Cmeehan

customer_reviews.title: It’s a ‘no’ from me.
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t provide any coverage or affect the redness at all. While it delivers immediate moisture, it is superficial and dissipates immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

product_meta.title: Maybelline New York Facestudio Master Prime Primer Makeup, Blur + Pore Minimize, 1 Fl Oz (1 Count)
product_meta.description: Color:Blur + Pore Minimize| Size:1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Flawless starts with primer! Blur away your skin concerns and perfect your makeup look with Master Prime from Maybelline New York. Our primers are formulated with a water base and active ingredients to blur your biggest skin concerns. Lightweight formulas apply smoothly and don’t leave skin feeling greasy so your makeup lasts all day. Dermatologist and allergy tested. Suitable for sensitive skin and all skin types. Does not clog pores.
feature_bullets: Blurs skin imperfections and smooths fine lines
Primes skin for even makeup application without a greasy feel
Apply all over face before foundation or wear alone

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
